title: Bleach: Shuku! Rukia Dakkan! Kagayaku! Shinigami Juuban Shoubu! Mitai Shinigami Doon to Misemasu Special

alternative_titles.en: Bleach: Gathering! Rukia's Rescue! Shining! The Ultimate Shinigami Showdown! Special Showing of the Shinigami Teams!
alternative_titles.ja: BLEACH 祝！ルキア奪還！輝け！死神十番勝負！見たい死神ドーンと見せますスペシャル

synopsis: Recap that originally aired with episode 63 of Bleach, then was released on the fifth volume DVD of the Soul Society: The Rescue arc.
